gov.usgs.volcanoes.pensive.plot

Class ChannelPlotter

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.usgs.volcanoes.pensive.plot.ChannelPlotter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FullPlotter, ThumbnailPlotter

    public abstract class ChannelPlotter
extends Object
    Create a combined wave/spectrogram plot for a single channel.
    Author:
    Tom Parker
